name: DeathMatch
detailed_description:
DeathMatch is an FPS game where you can play with your friends or other players,fight with the Team or on your own,in the path of victory. Experience the end of the game with various maps and weapons in the game. Experience new maps with an early access version and double entertainment.

* Take part in the game by playing on various maps in the game.
* Experience newly added weapons before anyone else.
* Experience the game styles.
* Fight your friends with the Team DeathMatch.
* Show your power to all by fighting on your own with the Single DeathMatch.
* Experience the new weapons challenge to every Death with Gun Game.

DeathMatch is a Turkish-made FPS game. Join the fight with your friends or alone.

short_description: DeathMatch is a Turkish-made FPS game. Join the fight with your friends or alone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later 32-bit and 64-bit
  • Processor: Pentium 4 / Anthlon 2500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later 32-bit and 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 / Amd Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
